footer.description: The lastest job news, articles, sent to your inbox weekly.

registrationForm.title: Register

validation.password: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and one special case character

registrationForm.success: Registration successful! Please check your email for verification.
registrationForm.error: Your account already exists. Failed to create a new account.

verification.title: Email Verification
verification.desc: Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to your email.
verification.code_resend: Verification code has been resent. Please check your email.

resetPasswordForm.title: Reset Password
resetPasswordForm.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending the password reset email. Please try again.

resetForm.title: Reset Your Password

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordStrong: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

resetForm.successMessage: Password reset successful! Redirecting to your profile...
resetForm.errorMessage: An error occurred during password reset. Please try again.

HeroSection.description: Great platform for the job seeker that searching for new career heights and passionate about startups.
HeroSection.title: through JobQuick

About-us.About-description: Job Quick, created in 2024 by undergraduate students at the Center for Advanced Science and Technology Development, is an online platform that empowers users to effortlessly search for, apply to, and track job opportunities.

detail.Who: We are the second generation of Basic Scholarship students from the Center for Advanced Science and Technology Development, having successfully completed a four-month course.
detail.Goals: Our mission is to provide online job seekers with a user-friendly and secure platform that effectively connects them with employers.
detail.Perspective: In our perspective, our goal is to develop a website that stands out as creative, highly customizable, and exceptionally user-friendly.
